		Question: what is charlie chaplin famous for
		Answer:
answer: Charlie Chaplin is famous for his silent film comedies, in which he played the iconic character of the Tramp. He was a master of physical comedy and slapstick, and his films were hugely popular around the world. Chaplin was also a talented director, producer, and screenwriter, and he is considered one of the most important figures in the history of cinema.
